author: Source: Ledbury Reporter
title: England footballer Adam Johnson due in court on child sex charges - Ledbury Reporter
text:
England and Sunderland footballer Adam Johnson denies three counts of sexual activity with a child and one count of grooming The defendant, from Castle Eden, County Durham, had his case moved from Durham and is expected to go on trial in February.
 Ledbury Reporter.
